column4: hey, i have a question. i'm trying to copy folder contents from a folder on my desktop to usr/lib folder, but i keep getting permission denied. how do i change that? i am using ubuntu 9.04
add sudo in front of the copy command
but it's a lot of files, so i was wondering if theres a way to copy them all at once?
so i type in sudo  cp *first folder*.*usr/lib*
look at what phisher1 said... cp -R dirname/* /new/dir
